717035410. Banat converted to reformed

Province of Banat — Not random

Triggered by

Action B, C, D of 717035413 - AI_EVENT for The Pope
Action C, D of 717035412 - AI_EVENT for The Pope
Action D of 717035411 - AI_EVENT for The Pope

Description

As a result of the spread of the reformation, the province is now considered as being of the reformed faith.

Actions

A. OK

  • Religion in Banat changes to reformed
